title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs via a simple CLI and REST API (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with built-in model management and GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat endpoint with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile).

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example consuming Ollama’s local REST API with streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (cpu/cuda/rocm) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Turn any document folder into a local RAG chatbot using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, and embeddings with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function calling, vision, JSON mode, fine-tune, multi-modal examples.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Terminal UI inspired by ChatGPT with markdown rendering, conversation branching, and model switcher.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels/DMs with thread support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-go
summary: First-party Go client library for Ollama with generate/chat/embed helpers.
